string-array.name: Quotes
string-array.item: "Sit by the sleet, you’ll look better by comparison." \n - Anonymous
"Good looking people turn me off. The weather today on the other hand…"\n - Anonymous
"I look at the weather therefore I am" \n - Anonymous
“It\'s not the weather that matters, it\'s what you see." \n ― Inspired by Henry David Thoreau
The weather doesn’t necessarily discriminate. It simply excludes certain types of good weather. \n - Anonymous
"All bad weather is the result of good intentions." \n - Inspired by Oscar Wilde
“Cloud. James Cloud.” \n - Inspired by James Bond.
"Any man who can be in the sun while kissing a pretty girl is simply not giving the sun the attention it deserves."\n - Inspired by Albert Einstein

“And, in the end
 The snow on your body
 is equal to the love you make.”
 - Inspired by Paul McCartney
"I am thankful for all of the clouds who didn’t rain on me. It’s because of them I’m doing it myself." \n - Inspired by Albert Einstein
"Instead of getting married again, I’m going to find a raindrop I don’t like and just give it a house." \n - Inspired by Rod Stewart
"Sunshine is like peeing on yourself: everyone can see it, but only you get the warm feeling that it brings." \n - Inspired by Robert Bloch
"To be in the sleet is the rarest thing in the world. Most people exist, that is all.” \n ― Citat inspired by Oscar Wilde
"“The worst part of being a grey cloud is trying to find someone who is happy for you.” \n - Inspired by Bette Midler

resources.string: Klicka på knappen för ett nice vädercitat
